title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Todd Herman guest hosts for Rush on Thursday. Whataboutism is an excuse to ignore hypocritical behavior. Why hasn’t the Turtle impeached Kamala Harris? Republicans nowhere to be found in impeachment of truth. The game of switching up is over, RINOs. Face a four-year rolling coup or apologize, Kamala. Democrats have a better business model than Republicans. An opportunity to represent real America. Low point of low points.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

The injection of trauma upon the American people. Hunter Biden. Build Back Better is racism. AOC’s program to destroy this show. Fear mindset: False evidence appearing real. Breaking the left’s illusion of power. The Turtle won’t rush impeachment trial, but is open to convict after Trump leaves office. We are capable of the peaceful counter revolution which will be so much fun. The systemic racism of the leftist agenda. Insider tips on running for office.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

It’s easy to be afraid when the country is being stolen. Valuable things that cannot be taken from us. Will you cede your freedom of speech? Caller: Police wanted a Capitol breach. The test is now and it’s pass or fail, Liz Cheney. Don’t give up! Democrats don’t have the capacity to cheat at every level. Antifa uses Twitter to plan and dox cops. James O’Keefe and Twitter whistleblowers. There are many steps in the peaceful counter revolution. Fight for the greatest among us, people the left considers “lesser.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
